programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his company’s most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.title: Broll: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Gravedigger Max Broll and retired soccer star Baroni team up to find Max’s stepmother Tilda, the local police commissioner, who has been abducted and buried alive in the woods. The clock is ticking – Tilda won`t survive more than 48 hours underground.

programme.title: The Inland Road
programme.desc: After surviving a car crash when running away from home, Tia finds herself having nowhere to go. Seeking out the family of the crash victim, she moves in with them and threatens to upend the family’s delicate balance.

programme.title: Murder. Money. Zurich. IV - Borchert and the Force of Habit
programme.desc: “Lawyer without a license” Thomas Borchert wants to save two confessed burglars from a murder charge. But with the evidence stacked against them, their only hope is to track down the real killer themselves.

programme.title: Risks And Side Effects
programme.desc: When Pilates trainer Kathrin needs a new kidney, her husband’s hesitation to be her donor results in a crisis in their marriage. Faced with issues of life and death, the fragility of the couple’s relationship is laid bare.

programme.title: Suro
programme.desc: A young, vulnerable couple inherits a cork-harvesting farm in rural Catalonia. As newly fledged landowners, they dream of building a fair and sustainable life, only to find their ideals clash head-on with their dire need to make money.

programme.title: Codename Holec
programme.desc: Honza films the Russian invasion of 1968 in Prague and takes the politically charged movie and actress Eva, the love of his life, on a secret trip to Vienna. There they meet a director who knows Eva very well and the Czech Secret Service even better.

programme.title: Remember To Blink
programme.desc: Jacqueline adopts two children from a foreign country with her husband. To help with translation, the kids are accompanied by Gabriele, a twenty-year old who is just starting to taste the sweetness of feeling power.

programme.title: Gossip
programme.desc: A junior overhears some juicy gossip, but when she attempts to retell it, she falls flat and bores her audience. Frustrated with her lacklustre storytelling skills, a group of seniors take it upon themselves to teach her the art of gossiping.

programme.title: All The Songs We Never Sang
programme.desc: Rebellious teen Natsumi ventures from Tokyo to a small island to meet her aunt and learn the art of pearl diving (but secretly to find a treasure she was told about as a child).

programme.title: Human Capital
programme.desc: Lake Como, Italy. A cyclist is hit off the road by a jeep in the night before Christmas Eve. What happened that night? How will this accident change the destiny of the rich Bernaschi family and the Rovelli family on the edge of bankruptcy?

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his company’s most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.title: A Dose Of Happiness (OTO)
programme.desc: Vesala’s search for happiness led her into an early marriage and a 3-year-old daughter. After her marriage fails, she and her daughter are brought down a path that leads to hell and back, one which brings her through drugs, fall, fear and redemption.

programme.title: Cryptid Hunter
programme.desc: A mockumentary about a passionate monster enthusiast’s search for elusive cryptids like ‘Bigfoot‘ or ‘Nessie‘. However, no matter how hard he tries to find them, he never seems to be able to spot any, even if they were right in front of his very eyes.

programme.title: Veins Of The World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his father’s vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: After The Storm
programme.desc: After a celebration in her rural hometown, Karla Petersen is murdered on her way home. Inspector Helen Dorn takes on the case but clashes with local officer Tom Petersen, Karla's brother, who defies warnings to find his sister's killer.

programme.desc: In an illegal arms case, three men, including two policemen, are dead. Mattheisen reveals a radical right-wing conspiracy, and suspects a mole. However, he is shot dead with Inspector Dorn’s weapon, while Dorn is found at the crime scene with no memory.

programme.title: Suro
programme.desc: A young, vulnerable couple inherits a cork-harvesting farm in rural Catalonia. As newly fledged landowners, they dream of building a fair and sustainable life, only to find their ideals clash head-on with their dire need to make money.

programme.title: Remember To Blink
programme.desc: Jacqueline adopts two children from a foreign country with her husband. To help with translation, the kids are accompanied by Gabriele, a twenty-year old who is just starting to taste the sweetness of feeling power.

programme.title: Human Capital
programme.desc: Lake Como, Italy. A cyclist is hit off the road by a jeep in the night before Christmas Eve. What happened that night? How will this accident change the destiny of the rich Bernaschi family and the Rovelli family on the edge of bankruptcy?

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In Calcutta
programme.desc: Having just lost her daughter and disillusioned with her marriage, Ela decides to start an independent life of her own. Unable to secure a housing loan, she uses her boss, the owner of a ponzi scheme, to get what she wants.

programme.title: Veins Of The World
programme.desc: After his father dies in a tragic car accident, 11-year-old Amra sets out to continue his father’s vision of the traditional nomad way of life and to continue his fight against global mining companies who threaten to destroy it.

programme.title: Passenger 23
programme.desc: Martin, a police psychologist who lost his wife and his son during a vacation, receives a call that brings new clues about the disappearance of his family and returns to the same cruise ship to discover the truth.

programme.title: Standing Up For Sunny
programme.desc: When Travis, a self-isolated recluse with low-grade cerebral palsy and anger management issues falls for Sunny, an unassuming comedian, he must take the stage to show his true self and win her love.

programme.title: A River Within
programme.desc: Five women with their own personal struggles travel to the Orange River for their “Adventure Therapy”. When things go awry in their river rafting adventure, their survival instincts kick in forcing them to dig deep.

programme.title: GAADI - Children Of The Sun
programme.desc: Stripped of her Radala cast and forcibly married to an outcast by the monarch, a woman fights to keep her dignity by rejecting to succumb to her destiny.

programme.title: Lucky Girl
programme.desc: TV star Nina Sokil is diagnosed with bone cancer, but deeming her career to be more important with her health, Nina goes to absurd lengths to hide her condition so that she keeps working.

programme.title: M.U.R.B.Y.
programme.desc: In a world where dogs transform into formidable wolves by consuming feathers, Rob, driven by ambition, steals coveted M.U.R.B.Y feathers. However, a gust of wind serves as a twist of fate which sends him on a soul-searching journey of moral dilemmas.
